summary: The diff shows modifications to AITradeAnalysisCard.tsx that implement entry point display functionality with color coding, formatting, and visual hierarchy. The implementation appears to align with REQ-31 requirements for displaying entry point information prominently at the top of the card.

missing_requirements.requirement: Entry reasoning text is displayed if available in the recommendation object
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff does not show evidence of entry reasoning text being displayed. While the entry point price and label appear to be implemented, there is no visible code rendering the entry reasoning field from the recommendation object.
